name: ANGER
body:
### What is? ANGER is acronym for **AN**other **G**reat & **E**asy **R**esponsive menu. Its purpose is to make simple to build a responsive menu starting from a wellformed HTML5 page menu. ### Usage 1. Include jQuery in your page ```html ``` 1. Include ANGER in your page after jQuery inclusion ```html ``` 1. Create your simple menu ```html
  • Menu 1
  • Menu 2
  • Menu 3
  • Menu 4
``` 1. Call ANGER ```javascript jQuery('#my-menu').anger(); ``` 1. Don't be Anger... do it with ANGER! :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
